text: Hans-Jürgen "Dixie" Dörner (25 January 1951 – 19 January 2022) was a German footballer and manager. He won a gold medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics while playing for East Germany. He played for that national team from 1969 until 1985. Dörner died on 19 January 2022 from a long-illness at his apartment in Dresden, Germany, at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German football managers Category:German footballers Category:Olympic gold medalists for East Germany Category:Sportspeople from Saxony Category:SV Werder Bremen managers
title: Hans-Jürgen Dörner
